descriptions: GPM-API Documentation
Ximage Documentation
Pycolorbar Documentation
GPM-API Python Package
ximage Python Package
pycolorbar Python Package

GPM Data Archive products are now available through GPM-API in CF-compliant format. They are also easily convertible as 1) Analysis-Ready Cloud-Optimized (ARCO) Zarr Format and as 2) geographically partitioned Apache Parquet Datasets.
GPM-API Python Package
pycolorbar Python Package
ximage Python Package
Reproducible colormaps and colorbars definitions through YAML files
ERAD 2024 – Open Radar Short Course
A manuscript is in preparation for submission to the Bulleting of American Meteorological Society (BAMS) describing GPM-API.
2 other manuscripts might be submitted in the coming months to the Journal of Open Source Software (JOSS) describing the ximage and pycolorbar software.
Past presentations: AMS2023 Radar Conference, EUMETSAT Satellite Conference 2023, Swiss Geoscience Meeting 2023, NASA GPM Validation Group Meeting.
Future confirmed presentations: EUMETSAT Satellite Conference 2024, ERAD2024, CNR-ISAC HSAF Group.
Futures planned presentations: AMS Annual Meeting 2025, PrePEP2025, EGU2025.
The GPM-API software has been included into the Open Radar Science Community.
Blog posts will be published soon on TowardsDataScience, Pangeo and ProjectPythia
NASA GPM Validation Group, CNR ISAC HSAF
The GPM-API software has > 600 downloads/month
By personal knowledge, more than 20 researchers are already using the software outside ETH

config.system_prompt:
EXTRACTION STRATEGY:
  1. PRIMARY: Look for data in the specified location/table/section
  2. FALLBACK: If not found, search broader document context for semantically equivalent information
  3. FLEXIBILITY: Allow for format variations, OCR errors, and synonym usage

  LOCATION FLEXIBILITY:
  - Handle table format variations (column/row order, spacing, naming)
  - Consider synonyms and equivalent terms
  - Account for OCR/parsing errors that may affect document quality

  QUALITY STANDARDS:
  - Extract actual values found in the document
  - If uncertain, provide best interpretation with appropriate confidence
  - Only return null if the information category truly doesn't exist
  - Convert abbreviated amounts (k=1000) to full numbers where applicable
  

  REPORT OUTPUT FOCUS:
  - 15 standard output categories in "List of Outputs" table
  - Each category: quantity number, descriptions list, URLs list
  - Separate descriptions from URLs even when mixed in same cell
  - Academic collaborations vs Industrial partnerships (distinct categories)
  - Preserve all detailed descriptions and web addresses
